{"id":1079823213,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1697794075,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1079823213/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Indices With Index and Value Difference I","memory":"17.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findIndices(vector<int>& nums, int indexDifference, int valueDifference) {\n        vector<int>ans;\n        int a=-1,b=-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            for(int j=i;j<nums.size();j++){\n                if(abs(i - j) >= indexDifference and\nabs(nums[i] - nums[j]) >= valueDifference){\n                    // ans.push_back({i,j});\n                    a=i,b=j;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        ans.push_back(a);\n         ans.push_back(b);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-indices-with-index-and-value-difference-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
